name: 小糸
text:
あ……
円香ちゃん、雛菜ちゃん

name: 小糸
text:
これ、舐めて待ってて……！
飴……！
trans:
Eat this while you wait...!
Candy...!

name: off
text: 課題は、全員終わらなかった

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～……
取られちゃってる～

name: 円香
text:
……このぬいぐるみ？
さっき浅倉と見てたやつ
trans:
...The stuffed animal?
The one Asakura was looking at.

name: 円香
trans: There's still some that look doable.

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜、ハートを抱っこしたやつが
よかった～……
trans: But Hinana wanted the one holding the heart～...

name: 円香
text:
……ああ
一番、取りやすい位置にあるのが、ってこと？
trans:
...Ahh.
Did it look like the easiest to get?

name: 雛菜
text:
え～！
円香先輩、できるの～？
trans:
Ehh～!
Madoka-senpai, can you do it～?

name: 円香
text: さあ。でもそんなに難しくなさそう
trans: Dunno. But it doesn't look too hard.

name: 雛菜
text:
円香先輩、やっていいよ？
雛菜、見てるから～
trans:
Madoka-senpai, I'll let you do it!
I'll be watching right here～

name: 円香
text:
……
別にこのぬいぐるみ欲しくないんだけど
trans:
......
I don't really want a stuffed toy, though.

name: 雛菜
text: じゃあもし取れたら払うね～？
trans: If you get it then, just give it to me, okay～?

name: off
text: だいたいのことが、できる
trans: I have a basic idea of how to do it.

name: 雛菜
text:
これ、ハート抱っこしたやつ
じゃないじゃん～
trans: This isn't the one with the heart～!

name: 円香
trans: ...Is it that big of a difference?

name: 雛菜
text:
変わるよ～！
顔だってあっちは眠そうでかわいいでしょ？
trans:
Of course～! The heart one looks cuter with its
sleepy face, doesn't it?

name: 円香
text:
…………
あの、奥にあるハートのでいいの？
trans: ...Is the one all the way inside okay?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
円香先輩、楽しい～？
trans:
Aha～
Madoka-senpai, are you having fun～?

name: 円香
text: ……アームの力、弱すぎじゃない？

name: 雛菜
text:
掴むんじゃなくて
引っ掛ければ～？
trans:
Instead of grabbing it,
what if you tried hooking it～?

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあふたつめのスイッチは
円香先輩がやってもいいけど～？
trans: If you want, you can press the 2nd button～

name: 円香
text: あー……何やってんの、行き過ぎ
trans:
Ahh... What did you do?
It's gone too far in.

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～、ピッタリでしょ～
……はい、円香先輩だよ～！
trans:
Hmm～? Isn't it perfect now～?
Okay, it's your turn, Madoka-senpai～!

name: 円香
text: 雛菜、最後までやっていい
trans: You can play the rest of it, Hinana.

name: 円香
trans: It's the perfect position, isn't it?

name: 雛菜
trans: I don't think I can get it in one turn, though～?

name: 小糸
text:
お、お待たせ……！ ごめんね
混んでて遅くなっちゃった……！
trans:
W-We're back...! Sorry for the delay.
It was really crowded, so we were a bit late...!

name: off
text: 課題は、別に難しくなかった

name: off
trans: But, it just seemed like a pain.

name: 円香
trans: I'm collecting 250 yen from everyone afterwards.

name: off
text: だから、もうちょっとだけ休憩
trans: So... let us have this break for a little longer...

name: off
text: この飴玉が溶けるまで
